She looked up at Andromeda, "I'm in. What's the plan?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ratchet/Bluestreak/Andromeda:::
> ::Ratchet thought for a moment::
> Ratchet: I believe you, Bluestreak and Andromeda would be the best 
choices to 
> go.  Sorry but im too big, and Sideswipes too shiny.  Theyd spot us 
quicker 
> than you guys, what do ya say?
> Bluestreak: Sounds good
> Andromeda: Im game.  What about you?
> ::She looks to SnowCat::
